meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amanda Burton Martha Warren Stephanie Jass Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6452.

td.p: Amanda Burton, a graduate student of library science from Chillicothe, Ohio
Martha Warren, an opera singer and voice teacher from Boxborough, Massachusetts
Stephanie Jass, a history professor from Milan, Michigan (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,000)

tr.td: THERE'S AN ANIMAL ON YOUR CAR
GENERAL FOOD
I'M GETTING EMOTIONAL HERE
LITERARY CROSSWORD CLUES "G"
LONDON CAN TAKE IT
GOIN' COUNTRY
